actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Constitution Heritage Act of 1988 to provide for the operation of the National Constitution Center.

summary.text: Amends the Constitution Heritage Act of 1988 to require a cooperative agreement entered into by the Secretary of the Interior with the National Constitution Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to: (1) authorize the Center to operate the Center, provide to visitors activities and services, and enter into arrangements with specified entities to carry out activities at the Center; (2) provide for revenues from facilities and services to be used to offset expenses for operating the Center; and (3) authorize the Center to occupy its site and necessary structures for a term not to exceed 99 years in accordance with such agreement.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Constitution Heritage Act of 1988 to provide for the operation of the National Constitution Center.
